namespace janus {



RaftCommo::RaftCommo(PollMgr* poll) : Communicator(poll) {
}

void RaftCommo::SendRequestVote(parid_t par_id,
                                siteid_t site_id,
                                uint64_t arg1,
                                uint64_t currentterm,
                                uint64_t lastlogindex,
                                uint64_t lastlogterm,
                                uint64_t leaderid,
                                int* votecount) {
  /*
   * Example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
   * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
   */
   //Log_info("send request vote rpc %d",site_id);
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  
 
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
  
    if (p.first == site_id) {
   // Log_info("%d<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<",site_id);


    arg1=site_id;
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [votecount](Future* fu) {
        /* this is a handler that will be invoked when the RPC returns */
        uint64_t ret1;
        bool_t vote_granted;
        int v=*votecount;
        /* retrieve RPC return values in order */
        fu->get_reply() >> ret1;
        fu->get_reply() >> vote_granted;
        /* process the RPC response here */
        if (vote_granted) {
          v++;
          *votecount=v;
        }
       
      };
     
      Call_Async(proxy, RequestVote, arg1, currentterm,lastlogindex,lastlogterm,leaderid, fuattr);
   }
  }
}

void RaftCommo::SendAppendEntries(parid_t par_id,
                                  siteid_t site_id,
                                  uint64_t leaderid,
                                  uint64_t leaderterm,
                                  shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd,
                                  uint64_t leaderindex,
                                  uint64_t previndex,
                                  uint64_t leadercommitindex,
                                  int* n_append,
                                  uint64_t l_term,
                                  uint64_t p_term,
                                  int *nextindex,
                                  bool* check) {

  //std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> lock();
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [n_append,nextindex,check](Future* fu) {
        int no=*n_append;
        int nxtindex= *nextindex;
        bool_t followerAppendOK;
        bool_t indexmismatch1 = false;
        fu->get_reply() >> indexmismatch1;
        fu->get_reply() >> followerAppendOK;
        
        if(followerAppendOK == true){
          no++;
          *n_append=no;
          //Log_info("%d append count",*n_append);
          *check = true;
        }
        if(indexmismatch1 == true){
           nxtindex--;
          *nextindex=nxtindex;
          *check=false;
          //Log_info("indexmismatch1");
        }
        else{
          //nxtindex=-1;
          //*nextindex=nxtindex;
        }
      };
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
     // std::cout<<cmd;
      MarshallDeputy md(cmd);


      Call_Async(proxy, AppendEntries,leaderid,leaderterm, md,leaderindex,previndex,leadercommitindex,l_term,p_term,fuattr);
    }
  }
}

//shared_ptr<IntEvent> 

void RaftCommo::SendString(parid_t par_id, siteid_t site_id,uint64_t currentterm) {
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  //auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
   if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      string res1;
      string *res=&res1;
      fuattr.callback = [res](Future* fu) {
     
        fu->get_reply() >> *res;
        //ev->Set(1);
       
      };
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
      Call_Async(proxy, HelloRpc,currentterm, fuattr);
    }
  }
  //return ev;
}



 void RaftCommo::SendEmptyAppend(parid_t par_id, 
                                  siteid_t site_id,
                                  uint64_t leaderid,
                                  uint64_t leaderterm,
                                  uint64_t commitedindex, 
                                  uint64_t leaderindex,
                                  bool* check,
                                  uint64_t l_term  ){

    //std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> lock1();
    auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
 // auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  
  for (auto& p : proxies) {


   if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
       
      fuattr.callback = [check](Future* fu) {
        bool_t indexmismatch=false;
        fu->get_reply() >> indexmismatch;
        if(indexmismatch == true){
          //Log_info("entered");
          *check=true;
        }
        // fu->get_reply() >> *ack;
       // ev->Set(1);
       
      };
     
      Call_Async(proxy, EmptyAppend,leaderid, leaderterm,commitedindex,leaderindex, l_term, fuattr);
    }
  }

  }  


} // namespace janus
